skins.shipDescription: Edinburgh-Class light cruiser ` Edinburgh, Hull number 16!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the lead ship of Edinburgh class of the Royal Navy. Sometimes it is stressful having an overly capable little sister... I took part in the pursuit of Bismarck and Scharnhorst, as well as many patrol missions in Atlantic, North sea and Mediterranean. In the end, I sunk with all my gold due to Ironblood torpedoes...
skins.acquisition: This is my turn, you might say! I am 'her' older sister, Edinburgh! In a sense, I am the 'most accomplished' light cruiser!
skins.login: Ah! I'm not doing anything weird! I'm just transporting gold bars into the room!
skins.details: I'm not going to give these to you no matter how much you stare at me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I want to be as elegant as Hood but, well...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eeeh! ...Bel, where are you? I forgot my keys again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmhmm~ Even Scharnhorst had to turn tail and run away when she saw me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hey!! Don't touch that! It's gonna fall!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, a lady would never hide her gold bars there!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Thanks! I'm feeling a bit more energized.

skins.shipDescription: Why doesn't she have to go to school with me...she says she’s a maid for the Queen? Well, me too! You can be a maid and school girl at the same time...tsk tsk---
skins.acquisition: Why doesn't she have to go to school with me...she says she’s a maid for the Queen? Well, me too! You can be a maid and school girl at the same time...tsk tsk---
skins.login: This pendant is so cute, right?! I copied from that girl. Let's call her “Belfast”.
skins.details: Hmm...this Alchemy is really mysterious, but once I mastered it, then Belfast’s trust fund will...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Belfast, wake me up before you wake up Elizabeth. Otherwise, she will criticize me for getting up late again...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Do I look like a child who’s so easily bullied? Hehe, but as elegant as I am, no wonder I am called a fairy.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Victory, let me rub your cheeks again, doing so always brings me good luck.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, wanna try my snacks? Ah~~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! C’mon out now will ya. I can't study this way…

skins.JPClientName: キャンディ（配りの）メイドさん
skins.shipDescription: Ahem! I made this special candy just for Halloween! Here, Commander, take some! Wooaaooah! Wh-who put this pumpkin here? It, it was me?!
skins.acquisition: Ahem! I made this special candy just for Halloween! Here, Commander, take some! Wooaaooah! Wh-who put this pumpkin here? It, it was me?!
skins.login: Ah! I'm just transporting the Queen's bullion in the pumpkin! It's not what you think!
skins.details: I'm a Royal Maid, I'm certainly not afraid of any- Hyaaaaah!? Wh-wh-where did that come from!? ... Phew... D- don't scare me like that now!
skins.secretaryIdle1: They're saying I've got spicy candy mixed in here...? That's odd... I hand picked them all myself... Now where did that rumor come from?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ta-daaah! It's a special Halloween Maid uniform! Lovely, innit? Heheee, I'd say bits of me even outshine Bel!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gneisenau's costume there, it's a bit... Um, it's something...
skins.secretaryTouch: Halloween candy delivery! You there, Commander, how would you like a treat endorsed by the Queen herself?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oi there! Don't be doing that when I'm busy!
